message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $95.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $85. Can you meet me at that price?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! I can do $90, but I'm not sure I can go any lower than that.
I'm still interested, but I was thinking more along the lines of $80. Can you meet me at that price?
